tooltips.tvl: Total Value Locked (TVL) is the total USD value of all IDS coins currently locked in the system.
tooltips.apy: Average Annual Percentage Yield (Average APY) is the aggregated average of annual interest rates from all IDS coin staking activities.
tooltips.users: The total number of users who have joined the platform, including both free and VIP accounts.
tooltips.locked: The total number of IDS coins that have been staked by all users.
tooltips.stakeProgress: Percentage of IDS coins staked compared to total balance.

verifyEmail.wait_1_minute: You have already requested email verification, please wait 1 minute to resend.

noti.stakeSuccess: You have successfully staked {amount} IDS coin with a lock period of {days} days. Rewards will be calculated from tomorrow and automatically added to your account daily.
noti.stakeError: You have failed to stake {amount} IDS coin with a lock period of {days} days. Please try again later.
noti.swapSuccess: You have successfully swapped {amount} USDT to {ids} IDS coin. Please wait 5-10 seconds to receive IDS in your wallet.
noti.swapError: You have failed to swap {amount} USDT to {ids} IDS coin. Please try again later.
noti.upgradeVipSuccess: You have successfully upgraded to VIP.
noti.upgradeVipError: You have failed to upgrade to VIP. Please try again later. Error: {error}

noti.web3ChainNotFound: Your wallet is not added to chain {chain}. Please add it to use our services.
noti.web3BalanceError: Error when getting wallet balance. Please try again later.
noti.addTransactionError: Error adding transaction data! Transaction hash: {txHash}

noti.cancelStakeTransacrtionError: Error when canceling stake transaction. Please try again later.
noti.returnStakeIDSError: Error when returning IDS to wallet. Please try again later.

noti.withdrawUSDTError: You have failed to withdraw {amount} USDT. Please try again later.

kyc_form.title: Identity Verification (KYC)
kyc_form.description: Complete verification to use full platform features
kyc_form.front_image_description: Take clear photo of document front
kyc_form.back_image_description: Take clear photo of document back
kyc_form.selfie_image_description: Take photo holding document next to face
kyc_form.guideline_clear: • Photos must be clear, not blurry or overexposed
kyc_form.guideline_corners: • Show all 4 corners of the document
kyc_form.guideline_selfie: • Selfie must clearly show face and document
kyc_form.guideline_match: • Information in photos must match entered data
kyc_form.success_message: Verification request has been submitted successfully

kyc_card.reward_description_verified: Share referral link for friends to join. Just when they complete KYC and you will receive 1 USDT reward for each successful KYC.
kyc_card.reward_description_unverified: Reward for each user who successfully completes KYC
kyc_card.kyc_required_description: Complete identity verification to join the rewards program
kyc_card.pending_description: Your KYC request has been submitted successfully, please wait for confirmation!
kyc_card.reward_description: Earn $1 for each successful F1 KYC (only applicable after you have completed your own KYC)
kyc_card.commission_modal_description: Commission details received when referring new users who have successfully completed KYC
